title: "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information."
body:
Was in the middle of a game when the client just randomly froze completely. I exited and tried to relaunch to find that were was a problem patching which then turned into the above message. I have literally done everything that has been recommended. I have uninstalled and re installed, I have deleted the air folder, I have repaired to program, and I have switched servers to try to patch. Not one thing has worked and I still get the same error.

Please help

replies.body:
i have the solution
hope its work for you guys :)
http://goo.gl/TGz4df
sorry this is for mac, but i hope its can be a reference

Hey Parthinax,

You should check out the [Wrenchmen's Toolbox](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-technical-issues) and look over the patching section. If you're still having the problem after running through those steps, please let me know!

Hi Parthinax,

Can you please upload your latest log files from:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Patcher Logs

Thanks!
